entry.data:
CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS AROUND 80

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS AROUND 80
